stories.title: Blogs should be clean and load fast
Nurturing Continued Growth of Our Oak CT Log

stories.text:
For security reasons I want to add a second phone number (for Telegram, signing up for services etc.)

Which service do you recommend? I know Twilio, but they are doing way more now than just phone numbers and I am afraid they cancel my account for no reason or not enough traffic.
stories.title: Ask HN: Which virtual phone number service do you recommend?
Why startup founders should always pay themselves a fair market salary

stories.text:
Hi HN,

I would build books' bibliography manager website but more like software package manager (e.g: NPM, crates.io). So people can browse book dependencies either as a bibliography or as an idea dependency of the book.

I wonder. Has anyone created that kind of web app? If not, I want go on that the idea. Is my idea bad?

Thank you.
stories.title: Ask HN: Has anyone created a books' bibliography/dependency manager site?
Show HN: Possible â€“ GPT-3 Idea Generator and Explorer
